bpp/descriptor.name: WAAYU
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Get delicious food delivered to your doorstep in Mumbai with our easy-to-use food delivery app. Order online from top restaurants now and satisfy your cravings instantly

descriptor.name: Peppy Paneer Pizza
descriptor.short_desc: Peppy Paneer Pizza is a popular Indian style pizza that featureas a combination of juicy Paneer Chunks topped with Mozzarella Cheese, Italian Pizza Sauce, Capsicum, Red Paprika short description
descriptor.long_desc: Peppy Paneer Pizza is a popular Indian style pizza that featureas a combination of juicy Paneer Chunks topped with Mozzarella Cheese, Italian Pizza Sauce, Capsicum, Red Paprika long description

descriptor.name: Cheessy Alloo Masti Burger
descriptor.short_desc: Aloo tikki burger is a delicious fusion dish that combines the flavours of Indian cuisine with the classic American burger. Indian street food made from mashed patatoes mixed with a variety of spices and herbs shaped  into patties typically consists of a soft burger bun, a vegetarian patty melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion. short description
descriptor.long_desc: Aloo tikki burger is a delicious fusion dish that combines the flavours of Indian cuisine with the classic American burger. Indian street food made from mashed patatoes mixed with a variety of spices and herbs shaped  into patties typically consists of a soft burger bun, a vegetarian patty melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion. long description

descriptor.name: Biscuit Cake
descriptor.short_desc: Sweet delicious biskit cake short description
descriptor.long_desc: Sweet delicious biskit cake long description

descriptor.name: Corn and Peas Sub
descriptor.short_desc: It is a savory grilled hicken with the sweetness of tender corn, united in perfect harmony with a soft sub roll. Indulge in a delectable blend of flavors that sure to satisfy your cravings. short description
descriptor.long_desc: It is a savory grilled hicken with the sweetness of tender corn, united in perfect harmony with a soft sub roll. Indulge in a delectable blend of flavors that sure to satisfy your cravings. long description

descriptor.name: Margherita Pizza
descriptor.short_desc: Margherita pizza is a traditional italian pizza that is made with a thin crust, tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, Margherita pizza is a classic and simple pizza that is beloved by many short description
descriptor.long_desc: Margherita pizza is a traditional italian pizza that is made with a thin crust, tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, Margherita pizza is a classic and simple pizza that is beloved by many long description

descriptor.name: Spicy Chicken Sausage Pizza
descriptor.short_desc: Medium Spicy Italian PIzza Sauce, Mozzarrella Cheese, Chicken Sausages marinated with Red Paprika Jalape, os & Onions short description
descriptor.long_desc: Medium Spicy Italian PIzza Sauce, Mozzarrella Cheese, Chicken Sausages marinated with Red Paprika Jalape, os & Onions long description

descriptor.name: Tandoori Paneer Pizza
descriptor.short_desc: Tandoori Paneer Pizza is a delicious and flavourful pizza that features a base of Mozzaerlla cheese, marinated Paneer in Tandoori sauce, and a topping of sliced onions, capsicum and red paprika short description
descriptor.long_desc: Tandoori Paneer Pizza is a delicious and flavourful pizza that features a base of Mozzaerlla cheese, marinated Paneer in Tandoori sauce, and a topping of sliced onions, capsicum and red paprika long description
